title: Someone knows How does one get championship zed?
body: Im seeing that its unavailable the skin of championship zed, idk how to get the skin someone can tell me pls? Thnks

replies.body: And someone of u knowns their price? (Rps)
It will be in patch 6.19 since they removed it from 6.18 patch notes... RIP
When it does arrive, it will be in the shop as any other normal skin would be.

I don't have any details on unreleased content, but information on new stuff in general will be posted at our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page.  Bookmark that page to stay up to date!
